content:
Both Steeped Tea Co. and The Green Tea House offer discounts and promotions for first-time customers, loyalty program members, and even students and seniors. Here's what I found out:

1. **Steeped Tea Co.**:
	* First-time customers: 10% off their first purchase with a sign-up for their newsletter.
	* Loyalty program: Earn 1 point for every $1 spent, and redeem 10 points for $1 off future purchases. Members also receive exclusive discounts, early access to new teas, and special promotions.
	* Students and seniors: 10% off all purchases with a valid ID.
	* Classes and workshops: Discounts available for package deals, repeat attendees, and loyalty program members.
2. **The Green Tea House**:
	* First-time customers: 15% off their first purchase with a sign-up for their newsletter.
	* Loyalty program: Earn 1 point for every $1 spent, and redeem 10 points for $1 off future purchases. Members also receive exclusive discounts, early access to new teas, and special promotions.
	* Students and seniors: 15% off all purchases with a valid ID.
	* Classes and workshops: Discounts available for package deals, repeat attendees, and loyalty program members. They also offer a "Tea and Class Bundle" deal, which includes a discounted rate for a class and a selection of teas.

It's always a good idea to check their websites, social media, or sign up for their newsletters to stay informed about current promotions and discounts. You can also ask their staff about any available deals when you visit their shops.

Remember, these discounts and promotions can help you try out their teas and classes at a lower cost, but they can also change or expire, so be sure to check the terms and conditions before making a purchase.

Happy tea shopping and learning!
